rukus.text: 74|32|Ore, savgand ʙa moh [ki hargiz cunin nest, ki onon tasavvur mekunand]
74|33|Va [savgand ʙa] şaʙ hangome ki puşt kunad
74|34|Va ʙa suʙh hangome ki ravşan şavad
74|35|Ki on [otaşi duzax] jake az [azoʙhoi] ʙuzurg [va havlnok] ast
74|36|Baroi inson ʙimdihanda ast
74|37|Baroi kase az şumo, ki ʙixohad [ʙo korhoi naku] peş aftad, jo [ʙo gunoh kardan] aqiʙ ʙimonad
74|38|Har kas dar garavi a'moli xeş ast
74|39|Magar ashoʙi jamin [mu'minon]
74|40|Ki dar ʙoƣho [-i ʙihişt] hastand va mepursand
74|41|az gunahgoron
74|42|«Cī ciz şumoro ʙa duzax darovard
74|43|[Duzaxijon] Megūjand: «Mo az namozguzoron naʙudem
74|44|Va ʙenavo[-jon]-ro it'om namekardem
74|45|Va pajvasta hamrohi jovagūjon [va ahli ʙotil] hamsado meşudem
74|46|Va hamvora rūzi çazoro takziʙ mekardem
74|47|To zamone, ki marg ʙa suroƣamon omad
74|48|Pas, şafoati şafoatkunandagon ʙa onho sude nameʙaxşad
74|49|Pas, onhoro ci şudaast, ki az pand [-u tazakkur] rūj gardondaand
74|50|Gūī, ki gūrxarone ramidaand
74|51|Ki az [muqoʙili] şer gurextaand
74|52|Balki har kadom az onho [tavaqqu' dorad va] mexohad, ki [ʙa ū] nomae kuşoda [va çudogona az sūji Alloh taolo] doda şavad
74|53|Hargiz, cunin nest [ki onon mepindorand]! Balki onho az [azoʙi] oxirat nametarsand
74|54|Na, cunin nest, ki onho megūjand, on [Qur'on] jak tazakkur va jodovarī ast
74|55|Pas, har kase, ki ʙixohad az on pand girad
74|56|Va jod namekunand [va pand namegirand], magar in ki Alloh taolo ʙixohad. Ūst, ki sazovori parvo kardan va omurzidan ast
